item.title: R and Python
item.description: library(reticulate) hey <- "What's up" hi ="Not much what about you" print(r.hey,hi) ## What's up Not much what about you Wrong <- "Nothing just sold all my Doge Coin" Correct = "What have you done" cat(c(Wrong,py$Correct)) ## Nothing just sold all my Doge Coin What have you done
